objective.label: Objective
objective.summary: To gain immense knowledge on professional ethics and to build a career in your high esteemed company where I can exhibit my interpersonal skills and carve a niche for myself in the field

workDetails: Contribute to design and development of Ecommerce project
Experience on developing feature implementation of e-commerce websites
Design additional feature for payment method for website
Design Breadcrumb as UI design and perform function
Develop Campaign product for New year and X-mas Packages

project-details.description: The Makro sells food and non-food products, usually located in differentsections of the store. Each store also contains a hot-food cafeteria, and a cash machines. The food section always includes a fresh fish section, a wine section, fresh meat and butchery department and refrigerated aisles. The non-food area includes clothing, DIY, office supplies, electricals, computing, and seasonal such as garden furniture.
project-details.responsibilities: Developed new features like Mattress campaign, developed campaign products like X-Mas Packages, Developed Breadcrumbs, Developed one step checkout, updated mini-cart feature, Added content at commerce tool, Handled critical bugs
